content:
Improve the world by improving your diet PERIOD

Michelle Samples teaches people how to do just that with macrobiotics classes every Tuesday at  p.m PERIOD at Well by Nature PERIOD

Macrobiotics helps people to achieve inner peace and harmony through balancing their intakes of certain foods and omitting other foods from their diets entirely such as meat and dairy products PERIOD

 Samples said PERIOD 

During the cooking classes Samples discusses Macrobiotics philosophy along with its benefits PERIOD The diet is renowned for relieving health problems according to Samples PERIOD She began studying the eating lifestyle because of personal health problems PERIOD

 she said PERIOD 

With hopes that other people would benefit from macrobiotics as much as she did Samples and her husband moved to Massachusetts so she could go through a 6month training process at the Kushi Institute in Boston PERIOD

And for  years she has been teaching the eating lifestyle to others PERIOD

Jill Hahn joined the class after seeing a flyer last winter PERIOD

 she said PERIOD 

The eating lifestyle can also be used to reach your bodys ideal weight PERIOD

 Hahn said PERIOD 

However weight maintenance is not Hahns favorite thing about the diet PERIOD It improves your outlook on life and gives you more energy she said PERIOD

 she said PERIOD 

Samples also stresses how important food intake is in determining your outlook on life PERIOD

 she said PERIOD 

Although the diet requires one to give up products such as meat and dairy and in Hahns case flour products not every indulgence is forbidden according to Hahn PERIOD

 she said PERIOD 

And because one cuts junk food and sodas off the grocery list the price of organic foods does not change the food bill much according to Hahn PERIOD

To learn more about the eating lifestyle and partake in Samples dishes you can attend any or all classes in the 10week series paying as you go or for the entire series at once PERIOD

Students can attend for  a class and the general public can attend for  a class PERIOD

Well by Nature is located by Natures Pantry on Kingston Pike PERIOD
